archimate:Requirement.name: TM.2.2.7a: a) post-incident reviews should be performed (involving an information security specialist) to identify the cause of the information security incident (e.g. by performing a root cause analysis)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
